Overwatch pron has always had more content than the actual game itself (unless you count l00tboxes and microtransactions). I'm surprised that Blizzard hasn't nerfed the women and made them a bowl of fruit.

Bring Diablo 2: Resurrected to Steam.

As much as people attack the game itself for what Blizzard is now, you wont fight any other game with this many mechanics, and a game that feels so fluid on its gameplay, i've loved overwatch since the beginning and so far no other game has done what this game did, so it is still for me the best and most complex fps in the market at the moment
Shit Garbage, wasted my life playing this trash
Billion dollar company, that is now owned by another multi-billion dollar company known for mostly good games makes game somehow worse than launch Fallout 76.
